correct: That's the right answer! You can press RESET to try again with a different answer.
match.notbinary: Your result needs to be a binary number. You can try again, or press RESET to try a different number.
match.notword: Your result should have exactly 8 binary digits. You can try again, or press RESET to try a different number.
match.wrong: It looks like you made a calculation error. Try again or press RESET to try a different number.
